answers.answer: First, you have not reached the doctor's forum.  You'll need to post there and pay the fee is you want their advice regarding this situation.Second, stop with the symptoms.  HIV cannot be diagnosed one way or the other by symptoms.  With regard to your protected sex and oral sex with the CSW, you did not have a measurable risk.  I would not be concerned.  With regard to the condom break you had a risk.  Sounds like it was a small risk.  In any event, if your negative result was 90 days after that exposure as you indicated then you are negative with regard to that exposure.  So you don't have anything to worry about.  Relax.  Use plenty of lube next time so your condoms don't break.

title: Is it a HIV infection?
